subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Martin Emmrich of Germany and his doubles partner, Andreas Siljeström, from Sweden, flew to New York with the hope that someone would withdraw from the United States Open and give them a chance to play in their first Grand Slam event.
snippet: Martin Emmrich of Germany and his doubles partner, Andreas Siljeström, from Sweden, flew to New York with the hope that someone would withdraw from the United States Open and give them a chance to play in their first Grand Slam event.
